H0.text: Interflug used the AN-2 and AN-24 aircraft - manufactured by which company. Antonov

H1.text: Interflug used the AN-2 and AN-24 aircraft - manufactured by which company. Ilyushin

H2.text: Interflug used the AN-2 and AN-24 aircraft - manufactured by which company. Tupolev

H3.text: Interflug used the AN-2 and AN-24 aircraft - manufactured by which company. OKB-153

A4.text: The An-2 biplane was a major achievement of this period, with hundreds of these aircraft still operating as of 2013.
